gensec_key2: Apni responsibilities ke alawa, General Secretory (GenSec) ka roles council ki smooth functioning ko ensure karna hai.
gensec_key4: Campus affairs ke bare me Board of Governors ke sath communicate karna
gensec_key5: Council ke sabhi members ki functioning ko dekhna aur conflicts ko resolve karna (aise sabhi conflicts channels par documented hone chahiye)
gensec_key6: NavGurukul premises me constitution ki respect banaye rakhna
gensec_key7: Monthly GBMs organize karna aur host karna
